name: squeegeed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
squeegee
to use a squeegee on a window, mirror, or other surface: He sprayed water over the surface and squeegeed it clean. They manually scrub and squeegee the first set of windows.
More examplesFewer examplesSqueegee the stall after showering.Squeegee off all the wet surfaces.The shower cubicle stays free of mould because we squeegee it while it's wet.
